input: Dialogue: Hello and welcome to AcmeCorp.  With whom do I have the pleasure of speaking with today? I am THE Norman Bouchard, the pimpiest pimp in Newark!  Here's the thing: I am wanting 2 pair of boots and a shirt, and want to inquire about overnight shipping. I'll be happy to help you with this Norman. I thank you very much! Did you want to upgrade your order to overnight shipping? Yes, but first I need to know a price. I only have so much in my bankroll, but this dude needs his slick threads quick! Oh yes, can I have your account ID and order ID to proceed, thanks. Let's see, I was not provided with that information! I got a pair of Guess Boots for $84, a pair of Tommy Hilfiger boots for $64, and a Michael Kors shirt for $99. You just want to know the price for the overnight shipping, correct? I have not ordered yet, I need to know the overnight shipping price beforehand! Ahh gotcha.  Okay, the price is $39.99 for anything 5 pounds or less.  $54.00 for 10 pounds or less, and $69.99 for everything else.  If you're in Hawaii or Alaska, the price is $10.00 higher, and we don't ship outside of the USA. ^ Sorry, that's $54.99 for 10 pounds or less. This is a great help for Bouchard! I appreciate it! You are so welcome.  Is there anything else I can help you with today No thank you! Have a wonderful day! You too!

input: Dialogue: Hi, there.  How may I help you? Hi I have a question Sure. My wife signed up for the premium subscription but I'm not sure what that exactly does. Can you explain what benefits I get? And how does a subscription get cancelled? I sure can. Do you know your membership level or do you just want to know about the levels in general? I'm at guest level We offer 3 different membership levels:  Bronze, Silver, and Gold. All members are invited to the annual holiday extravaganza with open bar and free drinks. that sounds cool! You also have free flights from anywhere in the US. Bronze members save on shipping fees and promo codes. Silver members also have the ability to have agents make purchases on their behalf and can cancel an order at any time. Gold members receive all of the aforementioned benefits and receive unlimited refunds. oh wow ok and what about the premium subscription? Gold members also receive the benefit of the doubt in all transactions. So our subscriptions are different from member levels. Do you know if your subscription is active right now? I don't know. Can you check? Yes I can. Your subscription is active. ok great if I wanted to cancel it how easy is it to do? Actually, the system just sent me an update. Your amount of $49 is due 3 days from now. ok if I don't pay for it, it will just lapse right? I'm not sure if I can pay for it. I've been furloughed. Correct.  I absolutely understand. ok I'll try to see if I can pay for it but it's good to know maybe the stimulus check will come in in the next couple off days anyway thanks for your help I hope they do come.  It's taking too long! You are welcome.  May I help you with anything else? that's it Have a wonderful day.

I'm at guest level We offer 3 different membership levels:  Bronze, Silver, and Gold. All members are invited to the annual holiday extravaganza with open bar and free drinks. that sounds cool! You also have free flights from anywhere in the US. Bronze members save on shipping fees and promo codes. Silver members also have the ability to have agents make purchases on their behalf and can cancel an order at any time. Gold members receive all of the aforementioned benefits and receive unlimited refunds. oh wow ok and what about the premium subscription? Gold members also receive the benefit of the doubt in all transactions. So our subscriptions are different from member levels. Do you know if your subscription is active right now? I don't know. Can you check? Yes I can. Your subscription is active. ok great if I wanted to cancel it how easy is it to do? Actually, the system just sent me an update. Your amount of $49 is due 3 days from now. ok if I don't pay for it, it will just lapse right? I'm not sure if I can pay for it. I've been furloughed. Correct.  I absolutely understand. ok I'll try to see if I can pay for it but it's good to know maybe the stimulus check will come in in the next couple off days anyway thanks for your help I hope they do come.  It's taking too long! You are welcome.  May I help you with anything else? that's it Have a wonderful day.
